newsitem.title: UK: European base metals physical trades - April 1.
newsitem.headline: European base metals physical trades - April 1.

text.p: Trades reported today were as follows. All prices in $/tonne and premium to LME unless stated.
APRIL 1 - Russian uncut nickel, $70 discount. Antimony, cif Rotterdam, $2,350, $2,375, $2,400.
MARCH 26 - Antimony, cif Rotterdam, $2,250, $2,300 (outright). High grade cobalt, cif Rotterdam, $23.65/lb (outright). Russian magnesium, cif Rotterdam, $2,350 (outright).
MARCH 25 - Russian cobalt, cif Rotterdam, $21.65/lb (outright). High grade cobalt, cif Rotterdam, $23.75/lb (outright). Zambian cobalt, cif Rotterdam, $22.10/lb (outright).
MARCH 21 - Antimony, cif Rotterdam, $2,150 (outright). Russian A0 aluminium ingots, cif Rotterdam, flat, $10.

MARCH 20 - Russian cobalt, delivered works, $19.90, $19.75/lb (outright). Russian cobalt, cif Rotterdam, $20.25/lb (outright). Zambian cobalt, cif Rotterdam, $21.00/lb (outright). HG cobalt, cif Rotterdam, $22.00/lb (outright).
MARCH 19 - Antimony, cif Rotterdam, $2,060 (outright). Antimony, prompt Rotterdam, $2,100 (outright).
MARCH 18 - Antimony, cif Rotterdam, $2,070 (outright). Antimony, cif Rotterdam, $2,150 ( outright).
MARCH 17 - HG antimony, cif Rotterdam, $2,395 (outright). Russian A7E aluminium ingots, cif Rotterdam, $38. Western aluminium ingots, cif Rotterdam, $48.
MARCH 14 - Antimony, cif Rotterdam, $2,215 (outright). Zambian cobalt, cif Rotterdam, $20.25/lb (outright).

MARCH 13 - Russian uncut nickel, cif Rotterdam, $40 (discount). Indium, cif Rotterdam, $310/kilo (outright). Antimony, cif Rotterdam, $2,125 (outright). Standard copper, cif Rotterdam, $10 (discount). SHG zinc, (duty-paid), Rotterdam, $25.
MARCH 12 - Western aluminium ingots, cif Rotterdam, $50. Western aluminium ingots, (duty-paid), Rotterdam $138, $140.
MARCH 11 - Russian A7E aluminium ingots, cif Rotterdam $35. Chinese tin, cif Rotterdam, $40. Western aluminium ingots, (duty-paid), Rotterdam, $135.
MARCH 10 - Grade A copper cathodes, cif Hamburg, $10. Western aluminium ingots, cif Rotterdam, $49.
MARCH 6 - Antimony, cif Rotterdam, $2,125 (outright). Indium, cif Rotterdam, $275, $250/kilo (outright). Gallium, cif Rotterdam, $410/kilo (outright).
